summary: Completed testing of new leaderboard scoring system and World Cup 2026 groups display. All 20 backend tests passed. Frontend UI verified with correct PTS column, matchday breakdown columns, and legend display.
seed_data_creation: None - used existing team and user data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Leaderboard API at /api/teams/{team_id}/leaderboard/by-league returns correct structure with league_name, matchdays array, and leaderboard with matchday_scores per user. Scoring logic verified: 3 pts for sole winner, 1 pt for tied winners, 0 pts otherwise. World Cup 2026 groups at /api/world-cup/groups returns all 12 groups (A-L) with 4 teams each. Frontend renders leaderboard with PTS column, per-matchday breakdown columns (MD headers), and legend showing '3★ = Sole Winner • 1 = Tied Winner • - = No win'.

leaderboard_api.notes: Returns list of leagues with matchdays array and leaderboard entries containing matchday_scores

world_cup_groups_api.notes: Returns all 12 groups (A-L) with correct team assignments

frontend_leaderboard.scoring_description: Scoring: 3 pts for matchday winner • 1 pt each if tied • 0 pts otherwise
